text: Francisco Mesa is an electrical engineer at the University of Seville, Spain. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to the theory and computation of wave propagation in microwave planar structures. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:University of Seville faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Francisco Mesa
